description:
In this video, you will learn how to craft a Siege Unit Miniature for D&D or Wargaming, the Battering Ram. Episode 5 of the Simple Castle Terrain for D&D.
↓↓ Check out the Super Interesting Links↓↓

➢Support the Channel on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/bardscraft 
➢or donate Paint Funds: https://www.paypal.me/lsjoman
➢Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bardscraft/
Thank you, any support is significant, as it allows me to craft more Terrain & Minis, and make simple tutorials of the process.

      -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PLAYLISTS TO WATCH
➢All my Monster Miniatures: https://tinyurl.com/y22ck2cv 
➢All my Terrain for D&D: https://tinyurl.com/yyco9kkr

          -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

ESSENTIAL ITEMS (any purchases following these link support the channel, thanks!)
➢5th Edition Monster Manual: https://amzn.to/2p5WHOn
➢7$ Kitchen "Crafting" Knife: https://amzn.to/2pK2A3T
➢PVA-Glue: https://amzn.to/2Wcesrp
➢Sturdy Utility Knife + Blades: https://amzn.to/2oceKCb
➢Handheld Foam Cutter: https://amzn.to/2WhDHbO
Disclaimer: I have not used the specific products, but I checked them and simply assume that they will do. I Hope this helps you get started!

          -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Join the Bard's Craft Discord server where we shall share and discuss Tabletop Crafting!
